name: rankpw

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wceq(cfv(crnk, cpw(c0)), csuc(cfv(crnk, c0))), wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))))
stmt.pretty: ax-mp((rank ` P(c0))= suc((rank ` c0)), c0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On))

⊢ (rank ` P(c0))= suc((rank ` c0))
